thread.title: Cleveland Browns vs. Baltimore Ravens: Bold predictions for Week 5 (Video)
thread.title_full: Cleveland Browns vs. Baltimore Ravens: Bold predictions for Week 5 (Video) | cleveland.com

author: Chris Fedor, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Cleveland Browns vs. Baltimore Ravens: Bold predictions for Week 5 (Video)
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- There's no more time for the Browns to chew on Sunday's loss against the San Diego Chargers. The Baltimore Ravens await this weekend, the first divisional matchup of the season.
Two teams at 1-3 are trying to turn around their disappointing starts and begin making up ground on the scorching Cincinnati Bengals. Two weeks ago Baltimore's home opener was spoiled by the Bengals, but the Ravens were able to bounce back to stun the Pittsburgh Steelers in Week 4.
Michael Reghi, Bud Shaw, Dan Labbe and I gave bold predictions for the Browns-Ravens game and beyond.
Click play on the video above to watch.
